CodeplexIssue.Title: How to open template file (.xltx) for editing
CodeplexIssue.DescriptionHtml:
I try to open my template file as: var doc = ExcelApp.Workbooks.Open('myTemplate.xltx', false, false); But, instead of opening template Excell create new file, based on template.
doc = ExcelApp.Workbooks.Open(filename: tName, updateLinks: false, readOnly: false, editable: true); - doesn't work (Error 1 The best overload for 'Open' does not have a parameter named 'editable')
Please, explain how to open template file (.xltx)

CodeplexComment.Author: SebastianDotNet
